Name: Hockey VR
About the game: The most realistic and advanced physics-based hockey simulation available! Features: Advanced virtual reality puck and stick physics using Unreal Engine Multiple control layouts available, Use both controllers for more realistic puck handling 3 Game Types: Shoot from either 4 or 5 different ice locations and Choose between Timed Shot, Shot Count, and One-Timer modes 3 different environments: Small Town Hockey Arena, Mountain Ice Rink, Forest Night Rink 2 Game modes: Shoot against Targets or Face-to-Face against an AI Goalie that watches your every move! Choose from Left or Right-handed sticks with curve Shot Assist mode to help you hone your skills Local Leaderboard; Play against friends for bragging rights Play using your real hockey stick! Upgrade your game by using Realstick, our optional controller mount that connects your controller to your real hockey stick Works with Quest 1 and 2 tethered with Oculus Link Cable or Air Link.
Meta Title: Hockey VR: Oct 14, 2021, Melcher Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hockey VR? Check out the release date (Oct 14, 2021), developer insights from Melcher Studios, and a complete game summary.
